name: Pretty Dinosaur Adventures of Ancient Earth VR
name_original: Pretty Dinosaur Adventures of Ancient Earth VR
description:
This is a 3D casual VR game. Players can take dinosaurs and follow the dinosaur with the first perspective. Feel the beautiful scenery and architecture in the high -altitude flight in the scene of the virgin forest and ancient Egypt. Regulate the flying speed, shuttle in different dense forests and ancient buildings, feel the visual impact brought by different perspectives, and feel a different visual feast!

Operation method:
Right -click on speed+ handle
Speed ​​-Powder left button
The menu handle menu/trigger key
